transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji mam, sir wo aapka call aaya tha customer care pe.
Customer: Haan wo baat hone lagi aapne requirement dal di na.
Executive: Matlab?
Customer: You wo ozone ki machineon ke liye mera requirement thi agar ozone wale se baat ho jaye to meri baat kara dijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi meri abhi aap se koi baat nahi hui hai aap mujhe batao aapne call kyun kari customer care pe?
Customer: Customer care pe maine isliye call ki thi mujhe ozone ki machineon ki jarurat thi ozone ki glass floor spring ki wo requirement pad chuki hai aapki IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ji mere paas calling aa rahi hai lekin other company se aa rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai. To ab customer care wala jo concern hai iske alawa aur kuch koi to reason nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi reason nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aapke paas maine apna number diya tha pichli baar aapne us pe call nahi kiya?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Main dobara number aapko batau save kar lo ek baar.
Customer: Nahi maine mam requirement dali hai kisi cheez ki.
Executive: Wo main samajh gayi aapne aapne na ye jo call aaya tha wo customer care pe aaya tha to customer care maine isliye pucha ki aapke account manager main hu aapke paas mera personal number hai to aapko jab bhi kisi cheez ki jarurat hua kare aap mujhe us pe contact kar liya karo.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. Haan aisa ho rahi hai sir.
Executive: To ye number aapka hi hai na?
Executive: Sir ye wala number mera nahi hai aap note kar lo ek baar number.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha ek minute aap usse call kar dijiye mam.
Executive: Sir usse call nahi kar paungi abhi ticket khuli hui hai kyunki aapne jo call hai wo customer care pe gayi hui hai isliye.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Bas ek baar note kar lijiye.
Customer: Bataye.
Executive: 95
Customer: 95
Executive: 48
Customer: 48
Executive: 58
Executive: 58
Executive: 3997
Customer: Theek hai theek hai ye number to hai mere paas.
Executive: Haan aap isi pe call kar liya karo jab bhi koi issue hua kare ye wala concern main abhi ke liye aapka close kar rahi hu aur iske alawa baki aur kuch puchna hai aapko to bataye.
Customer: Theek hai mam ji.
Executive: Kis naam se karna hai mam?
Executive: Sir Ritika ke naam se kar lijiye.
Customer: Ritika theek hai mam okay. Sir main keh rahi hu iske alawa aur koi pareshani?
Customer: Nahi abhi filhal to kuch nahi hai baki dekh lenge jo bhi hoga. Sir maine aapko bhi ek cheez aur boli thi jab last time mera aap se baat hua tha ki ek to sir thoda daily basis pe apna by lead consumption badha lijiye.
Executive: Abhi bhi badhayenge dheere dheere badha raha sara kuch.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir pata hai kitna chal raha hai jaise abhi hamara jo pura November hai usme 70 leads gaye hai na 17 aur hamara jo by lead abhi consume hua hai wo teen by lead consume hua hai.
Customer: Haan by lead aa kam raha hai na isliye utha hi nahi pa rahe hain unko.
Executive: Haan sir wo hai na tabhi badhega jaise jaise aap use karna start karoge na to aapke paas direct by leads wo aur jyada aana start ho jayega. Dusra sir hamara jo aapka jo catalog score hai wo chal raha hai 38.2%.
Customer: Are ye bahut kam ho gaya ye to.
Executive: Bahut jyada kam hai ab main aapko uska ek baar ek second de dijiye bas main aapko uska reason bata rahi hu ki kyun hai to hume usko bhi correct karna padega main bata deti hu usme ek to aapke total jo product hai I think 30 product pade hue hai usme jitna mere ko dikh raha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Lekin unki jo details bhari hui hai na wo properly nahi bhari hui hai kyunki usi ke basis par ye scoring hoti hai sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. Main aapko bata rahi hu kyunki catalog score company ke hisab se at least bear minimum 70% hona chahiye aur hamara chal raha hai 38 to to bahut hi na ke barabar ho gaya na.
Customer: Bahut kam hai ye to.
Executive: Main ek kaam main na abhi open hi kar rahi hu to main na ek kaam karti hu aapko bata deti hu kya kya aap mujhe bataoge ya kya kya main kar sakti hu usme theek hai ek second.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Open ho gaya haan sir problem ye hai isme jo aapke 27 product hai 30 mein se unki scoring bahut low hai low scoring hone ka karan kya hai sab mein jo photo hai wo ek ek photo dali hui hai.
Executive: Jabki hamare ko at least for product ke teen photos hone chahiye teen photo dalne ka matlab kya hai hume photo ke basis par 30 point mil jayenge to sabse pehli cheez to yahi kar sakte hain aap isme koi dikkat nahi hai aapke jitne bhi products hai sab mein aapko do do photos aur attach karni hai ek to aapki scoring usse better ho jayegi baki kisi kisi mein jaise specifications missing hai to wo to us hum baad mein bhi add kar sakte hain but pehle to aap photo hi add kar dijiye usse farak pad jayega.
Customer: Chaliye baki rate wagera to theek hai hamare rate wagera theek hai.
Executive: Haan photos aapko add karne hai isme.
Customer: Achcha ek photo mein do photo add aur ho jayenge.
Executive: Nahi nahi jaise ek product mein teen photo dalne hote hain to aap teen teen do do photo aur add kar dijiye.
Customer: Achcha do do photo aur add kar denge.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Dekh kaise ki voice a rahi hai isme.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs ozone machines.

- By-lead consumption is low.

- Catalog score is low (38.2%).



Resolution:

- Executive provided her personal number.

- Executive explained how to improve catalog score.

- Executive suggested adding two more photos to products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add two photos to products.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog score, product photos, customer care
